name: Fastvs E Fvrivs
description:
Pitch :

Fastvs E Fvrivs is a 2D game in which you play Fastvs and pilot a roman chariot in an arena to survive to multiples enemies. Dodge obstacles and don't get hit by the legendary creatures.

This game was designed to be played with an innovative controller. The player has 2 ropes to pilot his roman chariot.

Devices :
  • alternative controller (see pictures)
Controls :
  • Move Left : Pull left
  • Move Right : Pull right
  • Move Forwards : whip the ropes
  • Move Backwards : Pull both ropes
 Details :
  • An amazing romain chariot experience
  • Speed
  • Reflexes
  • and .... FUN !
Credits :

Designed by : Ouahid Ayoub , Parvillier Vincent

Developped by  : Morigan Letourneau

Art direction , Design and Création by : D'arco Julien, Guiomard César, Guessoum Anais, Pouts Benjamin, Pouts Benjamin, Marques Valentin, Couturier Baptiste, Huang Franck.
